plot: The four friends are back in town, to re-live the old days. But problems arise when one of them goes missing and an enemy from their past tries to hunt them down.
title: 2 Harihar Nagar
plot_es: The four friends are back in town, to re-live the old days. But problems arise when one of them goes missing and an enemy from their past tries to hunt them down.
plot_en: The four friends are back in town, to re-live the old days. But problems arise when one of them goes missing and an enemy from their past tries to hunt them down.
